questiontext.text: When testing for a coefficient from a multiple regression with three explanatory variables, the null hypothesis that states that the coefficient is 0 against the alternative that the coefficient is unequal to 0 is. The coefficient is b1 = 2.3 with se = 0.8 and there are 13 degrees of freedom. Then the null hypothesis

answer.text: Be rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.10.

feedback.text: Are rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.10.: Incorrect

answer.text: Be rejected at 0.05 but not at 0.02.

feedback.text: Are rejected at 0.05 but not at 0.02.: Incorrect

answer.text: Be rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.01.

feedback.text: Are rejected at 0.02 but not at 0.01.: Correct
